file_content.text: That was amazing. I thought we were dead.
You two alright? What happened here?
This Jedi attacked us, Master Orgus. He was sick... confused.
Thank the Force that you're both safe. This man's no Jedi--at least, not one of us.
He organized the attack on the training grounds. Called the Flesh Raiders his "soldiers."
He led these Flesh Raiders.
I warned the Council these natives aren't mindless beasts. This is proof.
You missed the fun, Master. Did you have something better to do?
You're late.
I was distracted by a pack of hungry Flesh Raiders. Thought I looked delicious.
If he's wasn't like us, what was he?
Not a Jedi?
I'd call him Sith, but the Empire doesn't know where Tython is.
This lightsaber... there's something familiar about it. Strange.
You held off all these attackers by yourself with only a practice saber. Impressive.
I followed my instincts, that's all.
The Force was with me.
They served you well.
I deserve a decent weapon--and my enemy doesn't need his anymore.
Give me a real lightsaber.
This weapon can help us discover who the man was. It's going to the Jedi Council.
Yes, I am.
Don't confuse confidence with arrogance, Padawan. Your Masters should've taught you the difference.
This battle's over, but we don't want any more Flesh Raiders coming through here.
That should hold them back, for now.
I can see why you're a Jedi Master.
That was amazing.
When you get as old as me, you learn a few tricks.
I want to learn how to do that.
How can I do that trick?
Spend a few decades practicing, and you'll pick it up in no time.
You should've left that open. We could've used it to destroy the Flesh Raiders.
We needed that tunnel for war.
Declaring war is the last thing we should do. There's too much we don't know about our enemy.
I'm injured, Master Orgus. Are the training grounds safe for travel?
Not yet. I'll get you to a medcenter.
You seem alright to travel alone. Report to the Jedi Council.
This valley isn't safe yet; I don't feel good about leaving.
I should stay and help.
We have Jedi Knights rooting out the last attackers. You're needed elsewhere.
I only just arrived on Tython. Where am I going?
Can you give me directions?
Going to a boring meeting is the last thing on my mind right now.
Talking isn't why I'm here.
Sounds familiar. But you're still going, Padawan.
Follow the path leading out of this valley. You'll find the Jedi Temple through the mountain pass. See you there.
Help--he's trying to kill me.
This place isn't safe. Leave while you can.
